Label: XML_FIXED_LINE
Comment: "12109 fixed line numbers are mentioned as ""Information Operator Assistance""\nby ITU. Added it to fixedline numbers as whole 12 range numbers are fixedline\nnumbers in Baku."

Label: XML_MOBILE
Comment: "Prefix 36554 is added to mobile as per confirmation from Ministry of\nCommunications in Azerbaijan."

Label: XML_PREMIUM_RATE
Comment: "These are marked as Interactive Calls in the ITU document."

Label: XML_TOLL_FREE
Comment: "88 is listed as fixed-line for Baku in the ITU document, but online numbers seem to\nsuggest they are in fact national toll-free numbers."
